description: NOTE: Mathcad Prime is the successor to Mathcad. While Mathcad Prime uses the MCDX format, Mathcad uses the .MCD format. To convert an MCD file to an MCDX file, use the Mathcad Prime 2.0 XMCD, MCD Converter program included with Mathcad Prime, which is accessible from the Windows Start menu or from the Input/Output ribbon bar tab in Mathcad Prime.
